DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy infant formula supplement galacto-oligosaccharides ( GOS ) , beta-palmitate acidify milk improve gastrointestinal health immune response healthy term infant .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Infant Formula Supplemented With Galacto-oligosaccharides , Beta-palmitate Acidified Milk
DOC.detailed_description: Infant formula alternative breast milk infant , whatever reason , human milk become unavailable . New-generation infant formula contain functional ingredient able mimic benefit human milk . The study formula supplement galacto-oligosaccharides , favor intestinal positive microflora growth , beta-palmitate , enhance fat calcium absorption soft stool formation , acidify milk contributes immune system maturation . The aim study verify safety study formula healthy term infant deepen efficacy functional ingredient blend term prebiotic effect , gastrointestinal tolerance immune response improvement .
